learning_objective: Store, copy, search, retrieve, modify, and delete information using a computing device and define the information stored as data.
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex is working on a biology project about the growth and reproduction of a special type of bacteria. Alex knows that these bacteria reproduce by dividing into two every hour. Alex started with a single bacteria at 9:00 AM.  How many bacteria will Alex have in their petri dish at 5:00 PM if none of the bacteria die?",
    "Answer1": "64",
    "Answer2": "256",
    "Answer3": "512",
    "Answer4": "128",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "Bacteria multiply by doubling every hour. So, the number of bacteria in the petri dish will be 2 to the power of hours. By 5:00 PM, 8 hours have passed, so there will be 2^8 or 512 bacteria."
}
